titles.title: To provide for conveyance of a lighthouse to the City of Kingston, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/18/2000--Introduced. Directs the conveying authority (Commandant of the Coast Guard or Administrator of General Services) to convey to the city of Kingston, New York, without monetary consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the Kingston Lighthouse (also known as Roundout Creek Light 2, Roundout Creek, Ulster County, Kingston, New York). Sets forth certain requirements with respect to the maintenance of such property.
